channel.title: [R2]ZMI-Extreme (ZMI-Runecrafter)
channel.description:
[CENTER] [b]Original post: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=65561[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I2Yes.png[/img]
[URL=http://stats.villavu.com/script/157][u][b]SRL Stats Page[/b][/u][/URL]
[B][U]Description:[/U][/B] The fastest Runecrafting XP in the west! ZMI-Extreme will power level your Runecrafting level using the fastest method currently in Runescape. The XP/Hour from using this is heavily dependent on your Runecrafting level, the higher you are the more chance you'll craft higher-level runes. For every rune that is crafted here, you get [b]double[/b] the XP. The only draw back is the runes you receive are random and you can only use [B]pure essence[/B] here. With this you can get anywhere from 22k-35k XP/Hour.
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B] *Power-Runecrafts at te ZMI alter *Choice of run-to-bank or Teleport-to-bank *Eating food if low on health (Food is user-defined) *Optional prayer-usage and alter-praying (Must be using teleport-method) (Automatically detects if using regular or curse prayers) *Choose which type of rune to pay to banker (Costs 20 per bank usage) *[B]Very[/B] fast *Solid break system (By Echo_) with cool graphics! *World switching option (World 70 recommended with this disabled) *SRL Stats *On-Screen progress report *[B]Massive[/B] amount of failsafes to ensure endurance
[B][U]AntiBans:[/U][/B] *Human'ish waiting periods *Human'ish rapid banking *Camera rotating and angle adjusting
[B][U]Speed increases:[/U][/B] *Rapid depositing and rapid withdrawing/pouch-filling *Instant checks for: Area locations, banking, walking, Obj/NPC tiles *Fast Prayer-handling *Double pouch emptying
[B][U]How to use:[/U][/B] *Start at the bank, the alter, or above ground near the ladder *If using teleport method or pouches you must have the suggested runes and be using Lunars magic *If using pouches, have them already in your inventory *[U]You MUST have the absolute newest Reflection 2[/U], get it [URL=http://"https://github.com/Drags111/Reflection_Dev/archives/master"]here[/URL].
[B][U]Setup (Red is required, yellow is suggested):[/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VCCs1.png[/img]
[B][U]Credits:[/U][/B] *ggzz (I think) who gave me the idea for a ZMI-Crafter. *Echo_ as always for his air-tight breaking system. [/center]
[End Note]:
This... was no easy script. I had it working successfully within a matter of hours from scratch, but when I got to the stage of increasing speed, making custom functions and absolute failsafes, then things became real complicated real fast. For a while I had the option to drop "junk runes" while running from the teleport to the ladder to increase speed some, but this was giving me real problems so I decided the gain wasn't worth the effort. In the end it took [U]2[/U] solid days to make this script exactly how I wanted it. This is by far my biggest script yet coming to just over 1,500 lines of code.
I've gone through some very precise testing and debugging and ironed out anything that could potentially break the script. But being [I]only human[/I] there's a good chance I've over-looked something so [B]please[/B] report major bugs to me on the [u]Villavu forums[/u], and I'll try my best to patch them up!
~Cheerz, Flight~

item.title: [R2]ZMI-Extreme (ZMI-Runecrafter)
item.dc:creator: @Wolf Wolf
item.description:
@Wolf wrote:

[CENTER]
Original post: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=65561

I2Yes.png797×250

SRL Stats Page

Description:
The fastest Runecrafting XP in the west! ZMI-Extreme will power level your Runecrafting level using the fastest method currently in Runescape. The XP/Hour from using this is heavily dependent on your Runecrafting level, the higher you are the more chance you’ll craft higher-level runes. For every rune that is crafted here, you get double the XP. The only draw back is the runes you receive are random and you can only use pure essence here. With this you can get anywhere from 22k-35k XP/Hour.

Features:
*Power-Runecrafts at te ZMI alter
*Choice of run-to-bank or Teleport-to-bank
*Eating food if low on health (Food is user-defined)
*Optional prayer-usage and alter-praying (Must be using teleport-method) (Automatically detects if using regular or curse prayers)
*Choose which type of rune to pay to banker (Costs 20 per bank usage)
*Very fast
*Solid break system (By Echo_) with cool graphics!
*World switching option (World 70 recommended with this disabled)
*SRL Stats
*On-Screen progress report
*Massive amount of failsafes to ensure endurance

AntiBans:
*Human’ish waiting periods
*Human’ish rapid banking
*Camera rotating and angle adjusting

Speed increases:
*Rapid depositing and rapid withdrawing/pouch-filling
*Instant checks for: Area locations, banking, walking, Obj/NPC tiles
*Fast Prayer-handling
*Double pouch emptying

How to use:
*Start at the bank, the alter, or above ground near the ladder
*If using teleport method or pouches you must have the suggested runes and be using Lunars magic
*If using pouches, have them already in your inventory
*You MUST have the absolute newest Reflection 2, get it here.

Setup (Red is required, yellow is suggested):

Credits:
*ggzz (I think) who gave me the idea for a ZMI-Crafter.
*Echo_ as always for his air-tight breaking system.
[/center]

[End Note]:

This… was no easy script. I had it working successfully within a matter of hours from scratch, but when I got to the stage of increasing speed, making custom functions and absolute failsafes, then things became real complicated real fast. For a while I had the option to drop “junk runes” while running from the teleport to the ladder to increase speed some, but this was giving me real problems so I decided the gain wasn’t worth the effort. In the end it took 2 solid days to make this script exactly how I wanted it. This is by far my biggest script yet coming to just over 1,500 lines of code.

I’ve gone through some very precise testing and debugging and ironed out anything that could potentially break the script. But being only human there’s a good chance I’ve over-looked something so please report major bugs to me on the Villavu forums, and I’ll try my best to patch them up!

~Cheerz, Flight~
